attributes.action: Lower The Price Of Freddo Bars Back Down To 10 Pence
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Ever Since The Price Of Freddo Bars Was Raised By 5 Pence, To 15Pence, The Amount Of Sales Has Gone Down To A Large Extent.
Thank You

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
